title: Constellation: Morning Star, Joan Miró
author: Joan Miró
description: A serene sunset over a calm lake.

title: The Starry Night
author: Vincent van Gogh
description: The Starry Night depicts a swirling midnight sky over a quiet Provençal village, luminous stars and crescent moon pulsing like living orbs. Van Gogh’s thick impasto strokes create rhythmic turbulence, contrasting cosmic motion with still dark cypress and clustered roofs, evoking awe, turbulence, and contemplative, restless spirituality amid quiet earth.
